TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FormViewDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner

summary.span: 在視覺化設計工具 (Visual Designer) 中，為 控制項提供設計階段支援。

span.span: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在視覺化設計工具中，當您從來源切換至 [設計] 檢視中，標記來源的程式碼，描述控制會經過剖析，而在設計介面上建立控制項的設計階段版本。In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes the control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface. 當您切換回原始碼檢視時，以設計階段控制項保存到標記來源的程式碼並編輯網頁的標記。When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page. 屬性類別提供下列功能：The properties of the class provide the following functionality: - 屬性會傳回物件，其中通常包含物件衍生自繼承樹狀結構中的每個層級的設計工具中的類別。The property returns a object, which typically contains an object that is derived from the class for each level in the inheritance tree of the designer. - 屬性會傳回集合的格式化配置中顯示**自動格式化** 對話方塊。The property returns a collection of formatting schemes for display in the **Auto Format** dialog box. - 屬性會傳回範本的相關聯的樣板群組集合。The property returns a collection of template groups for the templates of the associated . - 屬性一律會傳回`true`，指出設計工具會建立相關聯的暫存複本本來產生設計階段標記。The property always returns `true`, indicating that the designer creates a temporary copy of the associated to generate the design-time markup. 類別方法提供下列功能：The class methods provide the following functionality: - 方法會傳回用來呈現相關聯的標記在設計階段。The method returns the markup that is used to render the associated at design time. - 方法準備設計工具，來檢視、 編輯和設計關聯。The method prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated . - 方法時，會呼叫相關聯的資料來源的結構描述變更。The method is called when the schema of the data source for the associated changes. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何擴充類別，以變更衍生自控制項的外觀控制項在設計階段。The following code example shows how to extend the class to change the appearance of controls that are derived from the control at design time. 範例衍生`MyFormView`控制項從控制項。The example derives the `MyFormView` control from the control. `MyFormView`只是一份。The `MyFormView` is simply a copy of the . 此範例也是衍生`MyFormViewDesigner`類別從，並將放物件`MyFormViewDesigner`上`MyFormView`控制項。The example also derives the `MyFormViewDesigner` class from the and places a object for the `MyFormViewDesigner` on the `MyFormView` control. `MyFormViewDesigner`覆寫下列項目：The `MyFormViewDesigner` overrides the following items: - 屬性可指定頁面巡覽區資料列的設計階段檢視`MyFormView`包含四個頁面連結。The property to specify that the pager row for the design-time view of the `MyFormView` contain four page links. - 方法以包含屬性，如果它已指定，為新的第一個資料列中`MyFormView`在設計階段的方格。The method to include the property, if it is specified, as a new first row in the `MyFormView` grid at design time. 如果的屬性`MyFormView`是或是的值，繪製，使其範圍更明顯可見的控制項周圍的藍色虛線的框線。If the property of the `MyFormView` is the or value, the draws a blue dashed border around the control to make its extent more visible. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner/CS/formviewdesigner.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner/VB/formviewdesigner.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 在內部建立的新執行個體類別時，它會建立相關聯控制項或一份設計介面上的控制項。The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the class when it creates the associated control or a copy of the control on the design surface.

value.span: 與這個設計工具相關聯的 。

span.span: Gets the collection of automatic formatting schemes for display in the **Auto Format** dialog box.

value.span: ，其中包含 的預先定義配置。

span.span: A that contains the predefined schemes for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件的填入方式從 XML 編碼的成員的內部類別。The object is populated from an XML-encoded member of an internal class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetDesignTimeHtml () As String

summary.span: 取得在設計階段用來呈現關聯控制項的標記。

span.span: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time.

returns.span: ，包含在設計階段用來呈現 的標記。

span.span: A containing the markup used to render the at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已定義的項目範本控制項中，方法會設定設為空白控制項集合陣列，如果無法取得資料來源的結構描述。If an item template has been defined for the control, the method sets the collection of the control to an empty array if the schema for the data source cannot be obtained. 重新整理物件來強制呼叫方法。The refreshes the object to force a call to the method. 然後呼叫基底方法，來產生標記。The then calls the base method to generate the markup. 如果已經為不定義的任何項目範本控制呼叫方法，以產生呈現為替代符號的標記。If no item template has been defined for the control, the calls the method to generate markup that renders to a placeholder. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法中的類別，繼承自類別，以變更的外觀控制項在設計階段。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the class to change the appearance of the control at design time. 範例會將新的第一個資料列加入至方格，將包含屬性，如果定義。The example adds a new first row to the grid to contain the property, if the is defined. 如果衍生自控制項的屬性是或是的值，繪製，使其範圍更明顯可見的控制項周圍的藍色虛線的框線。If the property of the control that is derived from the is the or value, the draws a blue dashed border around the control to make its extent more visible. 此範例不會變更控制項的執行階段外觀。The example does not change the run-time appearance of the control. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner/CS/formviewdesigner.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner/VB/formviewdesigner.vb#4)]

span.para: 如果您覆寫方法，請務必呼叫基底方法，因為它最後透過數種覆寫層級，會呼叫上控制項或一份來產生標記的控制項。
If you override the method, be sure to call the base method because it eventually, through several override levels, calls on the control or a copy of the control to generate the markup.

Protected Overrides Function GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml () As String

summary.span: 取得標記文字，用來在設計階段呈現關聯控制項的替代符號。

span.span: Gets the markup text that is used to render a placeholder for the associated control at design time.

returns.span: ，包含在設計介面上呈現為替代符號的標記文字。

span.span: A containing markup text that renders to a placeholder on the design surface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果標記控制項不會包含這其中一個項目範本方法呼叫方法，以產生標記的預留位置，其中包含有關如何編輯範本內容和訊息項目範本需要。If the markup for the control does not include one of the item templates, the method calls the method, which generates the markup for a placeholder that contains instructions on how to edit template content and a message that an item template is required.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Initialize(class System.ComponentModel.IComponent component) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Initialize (component As IComponent)

span.span: A , which implements an .

summary.span: 準備設計工具，以檢視、編輯和設計關聯控制項。

span.span: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設計工具主應用程式呼叫方法時就準備好使用設計工具來呈現控制項。The designer host calls the method when it is ready to use the designer to render the control. 和其基底方法設定屬性，並連接至設計工具的運作所需的事件。The and its base methods configure properties and connect to events that are necessary for the operation of the designer. `component`參數是與這個設計工具或一份相關聯的控制項控制項。The `component` parameter is the control that is associated with this designer or a copy of the control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnSchemaRefreshed() cil managed

summary.span: 當關聯控制項的資料來源結構描述變更時呼叫。

span.span: Called when the schema of the data source for the associated control changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設計工具處於樣板編輯模式或欄位，除非是要加入或編輯方法呼叫方法，再呼叫方法來更新以反映資料來源變更的控制項。Unless the designer is in template editing mode or a field is being added or edited, the method calls the method, which in turn calls the method to update the control to reflect the data source change.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void PreFilterProperties(class System.Collections.IDictionary properties) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub PreFilterProperties (properties As IDictionary)

span.span: The properties for the class of the component.

summary.span: 在設計階段將屬性加入至設計主應用程式中的屬性方格或從其中移除屬性，或提供可能對應至關聯控制項之屬性的新設計階段屬性。

span.span: Adds or removes properties in the properties grid in a design host at design time, or provides new design-time properties that might correspond to properties on the associated control.

member this.RenderOuterTable : bool with get, set

summary.span: 指定 控制項是否使用外部資料表容器來套用內嵌 CSS 樣式規則。

span.span: Specifies whether the control uses an outer table container to apply inline CSS style rules.

value.span: 如果控制項使用外部資料表容器來套用內嵌 CSS 樣式規則，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the control uses an outer table container to apply inline CSS style rules; otherwise, .
The default is

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項使用外部資料表容器來套用在標記中的內嵌樣式規則。The control uses an outer table container to apply inline style rule in the markup. 您可以將此屬性設定為移除外部資料表容器`true`。You can remove the outer table container by setting this property to `true`. 這提供中套用 CSS 樣式規則中的控制項標記的彈性。This provides flexibility in applying CSS style rules in the control markup.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property SampleRowCount As Integer
protected: virtual property int SampleRowCount { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得要讓關聯控制項顯示的範例資料列數。

span.span: Gets the number of sample rows for the associated control to display.
The number of sample rows.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一律會傳回`2`。The always returns `2`. 這會導致兩個頁面所連結的頁面巡覽區資料列中顯示控制項在設計階段，如果模式是數值。This causes two page links to be displayed in the pager row of the control at design time, if the mode is numeric. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫屬性中的類別，繼承自類別，以變更的頁面巡覽區資料列中顯示的頁面連結數目控制項在設計階段。The following code example shows how to override the property in a class that is inherited from the class to change the number of page links appearing in the pager row of the control at design time. 範例會顯示四個頁面連結。The example causes four page links to display. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner/CS/formviewdesigner.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner/VB/formviewdesigner.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property TemplateGroups As TemplateGroupCollection

summary.span: 針對關聯控制項的欄位，取得範本群組的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of template groups for the fields of the associated control.

value.span: ，包含 中各樣板化欄位的項目。

span.span: A containing an element for each templated field in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性建構的集合物件，一個在相關聯的每個控制項範本控制項。The property constructs a collection of objects, one for each control template in the associated control. 控制項範本是標頭、 頁尾、 頁面巡覽區、 項目、 編輯項目，插入項目和空的資料。The control templates are the header, footer, pager, item, edit item, insert item, and empty data. 在控制項樣板項目包含單一物件。The control template elements contain a single object.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property UsePreviewControl As Boolean
protected: virtual property bool UsePreviewControl { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指出設計工具是否應該使用暫存複本，而非與設計工具關聯的實際控制項，來產生設計階段標記。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the designer should use a temporary copy rather than the actual control that is associated with the designer to generate the design-time markup.
Always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為屬性一律會是 true，設計工具會使用控制項，其中包含一份相關聯的控制項來產生設計階段標記。Because the property is always true, the designer uses a control that contains a copy of the associated control to generate the design-time markup. 控制項不會影響任何持續性。The control does not affect any persistence for the . 如果已覆寫屬性來傳回`false`，設計工具會使用相關聯本身產生設計階段標記。If the property has been overridden to return `false`, the designer will use the associated itself to generate the design-time markup.

span.para: 您可以覆寫屬性來傳回或者判斷其中的控制項是否標示為類別層級值物件。如果不會覆寫，控制項會忽略。
You can override the property to return or to determine its value based on whether the control is marked with a class level object. If the is not overridden, the control ignores the .
